lead_paragraph: The Peugeot 3008, the French automaker's offering for the hot mid-size SUV segment, has been named "Car of the Year" by dozens of European motoring journalists.
snippet: The Peugeot 3008, the French automaker's offering for the hot mid-size SUV segment, has been named "Car of the Year" by dozens of European motoring journalists....

headline.main: Peugeot 3008 Named 'Car of the Year' at Geneva Auto Show
headline.print_headline: Peugeot 3008 Named 'Car of the Year' at Geneva Auto Show
